verses.name: 2 Peter 2:8
verses.text: (For that righteous man dwelling among them, in seeing and hearing, vexed his righteous soul from day to day with their unlawful deeds;)

verses.name: 2 Peter 2:9
verses.text: The Lord knoweth how to deliver the godly out of temptations, and to reserve the unjust unto the day of judgment to be punished:

verses.name: 2 Peter 2:10
verses.text: But chiefly them that walk after the flesh in the lust of uncleanness, and despise government. Presumptuous are they, selfwilled, they are not afraid to speak evil of dignities.

verses.name: 2 Peter 2:11
verses.text: Whereas angels, which are greater in power and might, bring not railing accusation against them before the Lord.
